name: cbvopab1v
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wceq(copab(s0, s1, w0), copab(s2, s1, w1))

body.origin:
|- wceq(copab(s0, s1, w0), copab(s2, s1, w1))
-| wnf(s2, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffss(s1, s2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(copab(s0, s1, w0), copab(s2, s1, w1))
-| wnf(s2, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffss(s1, s2)

|- wceq(copab(s0, s1, w0), copab(s2, s1, w1))
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffss(s1, s2)
-| diffsw(s2, w0)

|- wceq(copab(s0, s1, w0), copab(s2, s1, w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffss(s1, s2)
-| diffsw(s2, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

comment: Rule used to change the first bound variable in an ordered pair abstraction, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 31-Jul-2003.) (Proof shortened by Eric Schmidt, 4-Apr-2007.)
